CIS_1.title: Inventory and Control of Enterprise Assets
CIS_1.description: Actively manage (inventory, track, and correct) all enterprise assets connected to the infrastructure

safeguards.title: Establish and Maintain Detailed Enterprise Asset Inventory
safeguards.description: Establish and maintain an accurate, detailed, and up-to-date inventory of all enterprise assets
safeguards.implementation_guidance: Use automated discovery tools and maintain centralized CMDB
safeguards.measurement: Percentage of assets discovered and inventoried within 48 hours

safeguards.title: Address Unauthorized Assets
safeguards.description: Ensure that only authorized assets are given access to the enterprise network
safeguards.implementation_guidance: Implement NAC and automated quarantine for unauthorized devices
safeguards.measurement: Time to detect and isolate unauthorized assets

safeguards.title: Utilize an Active Discovery Tool
safeguards.description: Utilize an active discovery tool to identify assets connected to the enterprise network
safeguards.implementation_guidance: Deploy network scanning tools with regular automated scans
safeguards.measurement: Coverage percentage of network segments scanned

CIS_1.business_rationale: You cannot protect what you do not know you have

CIS_2.title: Inventory and Control of Software Assets
CIS_2.description: Actively manage (inventory, track, and correct) all software on the network

safeguards.title: Establish and Maintain a Software Inventory
safeguards.description: Establish and maintain an inventory of software applications installed on enterprise assets
safeguards.implementation_guidance: Use software asset management tools for comprehensive visibility
safeguards.measurement: Percentage of software assets inventoried and classified

safeguards.title: Ensure Authorized Software is Currently Supported
safeguards.description: Ensure that only currently supported software is designated as authorized
safeguards.implementation_guidance: Maintain current support status and end-of-life tracking
safeguards.measurement: Percentage of software with current vendor support

safeguards.title: Address Unauthorized Software
safeguards.description: Ensure that unauthorized software is either removed from use or approved as a documented exception
safeguards.implementation_guidance: Implement application control and removal processes
safeguards.measurement: Time to remediate unauthorized software installations

CIS_2.business_rationale: Unauthorized software presents significant security risks

CIS_3.title: Data Protection
CIS_3.description: Develop processes and technical controls to identify, classify, securely handle, retain, and dispose of data

safeguards.title: Establish and Maintain a Data Management Process
safeguards.description: Establish and maintain a data management process that addresses data sensitivity
safeguards.implementation_guidance: Develop data classification scheme and handling procedures
safeguards.measurement: Percentage of data classified according to sensitivity levels

safeguards.title: Configure Data Access Control Lists
safeguards.description: Configure data access control lists based on a user's need to know
safeguards.implementation_guidance: Implement role-based access control with regular reviews
safeguards.measurement: Percentage of data repositories with properly configured ACLs

CIS_3.business_rationale: Data is often the target and end goal of attacks

CIS_4.title: Secure Configuration of Enterprise Assets and Software
CIS_4.description: Establish and maintain the secure configuration of enterprise assets and software

safeguards.title: Establish and Maintain a Secure Configuration Process
safeguards.description: Establish and maintain a secure configuration process for enterprise assets
safeguards.implementation_guidance: Develop configuration baselines and change management
safeguards.measurement: Percentage of assets configured according to secure baselines

CIS_5.title: Account Management
CIS_5.description: Use processes and tools to assign access rights and privileges for enterprise assets

safeguards.title: Establish and Maintain an Inventory of Accounts
safeguards.description: Establish and maintain an inventory of all accounts managed in the enterprise
safeguards.implementation_guidance: Use identity governance tools for account lifecycle management
safeguards.measurement: Percentage of accounts inventoried and classified

safeguards.title: Use Unique Passwords
safeguards.description: Use unique passwords for all enterprise assets
safeguards.implementation_guidance: Enforce password uniqueness policies across all systems
safeguards.measurement: Percentage of accounts with unique passwords verified

CIS_5.business_rationale: Improper account management leads to unauthorized access

CIS_6.title: Access Control Management
CIS_6.description: Use processes and tools to create, assign, manage, and revoke access credentials and privileges

safeguards.title: Establish an Access Granting Process
safeguards.description: Establish and follow a process for granting access that includes identity verification
safeguards.implementation_guidance: Implement formal access request and approval workflow
safeguards.measurement: Percentage of access grants following established process

safeguards.title: Establish an Access Revoking Process
safeguards.description: Establish and follow a process for revoking access to enterprise assets
safeguards.implementation_guidance: Automate access revocation upon role changes or termination
safeguards.measurement: Average time to revoke access after trigger event

safeguards.title: Require MFA for Externally-Exposed Applications
safeguards.description: Require all externally-exposed enterprise or third-party applications to enforce MFA
safeguards.implementation_guidance: Deploy enterprise MFA solution for external-facing applications
safeguards.measurement: Percentage of external applications protected with MFA

CIS_6.business_rationale: Access controls are fundamental to security

CIS_8.title: Audit Log Management
CIS_8.description: Collect, alert, review, and retain audit logs of events that could help detect, understand, or recover from an attack

safeguards.title: Establish and Maintain an Audit Log Management Process
safeguards.description: Establish and maintain an audit log management process that defines log requirements
safeguards.implementation_guidance: Define logging requirements and retention policies
safeguards.measurement: Percentage of systems with configured audit logging

safeguards.title: Collect Audit Logs
safeguards.description: Collect audit logs from enterprise assets and store them in a central location
safeguards.implementation_guidance: Implement centralized logging with SIEM integration
safeguards.measurement: Percentage of enterprise assets sending logs to central location

CIS_8.business_rationale: Logs provide critical evidence and detection capabilities

CIS_12.title: Network Infrastructure Management
CIS_12.description: Establish, implement, and actively manage (track, report, correct) network devices

safeguards.title: Ensure Network Infrastructure is Up-to-Date
safeguards.description: Ensure network infrastructure is kept up-to-date with security patches
safeguards.implementation_guidance: Implement automated patch management for network devices
safeguards.measurement: Percentage of network devices with current security patches

CIS_12.business_rationale: Network is the foundation of enterprise connectivity

CIS_13.title: Network Monitoring and Defense
CIS_13.description: Operate processes and tooling to establish and maintain comprehensive network monitoring and defense

safeguards.title: Centralize Security Event Alerting
safeguards.description: Centralize security event alerting across enterprise network security devices
safeguards.implementation_guidance: Deploy SIEM with correlation rules and alerting
safeguards.measurement: Percentage of security events centrally monitored and alerted

CIS_13.business_rationale: Network monitoring provides early threat detection

CIS_16.title: Application Software Security
CIS_16.description: Manage the security life cycle of in-house developed, hosted, or acquired software

safeguards.title: Establish and Maintain a Secure Application Development Process
safeguards.description: Establish and maintain a secure application development process
safeguards.implementation_guidance: Implement SDLC with security gates and code review
safeguards.measurement: Percentage of applications following secure development process

IG1.name: Implementation Group 1
IG1.description: Basic cyber hygiene - essential security controls for all organizations
IG1.target_organizations: Small to medium enterprises, limited security resources

IG2.name: Implementation Group 2
IG2.description: Intermediate security - organizations with greater risk exposure
IG2.target_organizations: Medium to large enterprises, moderate security resources

IG3.name: Implementation Group 3
IG3.description: Advanced security - high-risk organizations or regulatory requirements
IG3.target_organizations: Large enterprises, highly regulated industries, critical infrastructure

CIS_16.rationale: Application security supports malicious code detection
